multi_processing module¶

class multi_processing.Process(queue)¶

Bases: Process

A single multiprocessing process

calculate(params)¶
run()¶

Method to be run in sub-process; can be overridden in sub-class

class multi_processing.Stop¶

Bases: object

multi_processing.calculate(queue, PROCESSES=32)¶

Calculate the Mie spectra for all permuations of the parameters, using a multiprocessing pool of (by default) 32 processes.

PROCESSES=25: int, number of processes to spawn
